select count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =1 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) january , count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =2 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) february, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =3 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) march, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =4 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) april, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =5 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) may, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =6 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) june, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =7 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) july, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =8 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) august, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =9 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) september, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =10 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) october, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =11 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) november, count(distinct case WHEN MONTH(business_Hours_start) =12 THEN industry_involved ELSE null END) december
from company where year(business_Hours_start) = #{year} and del_flag = '0'
AND business_Hours_start >= #{dateStart}
AND #{dateEnd} >= business_Hours_start
select company_qualityRating ,count(1) as creditNum from company where del_flag = '0' group by company_qualityRating
select industry_involved,count(1) as industryNun from company where del_flag = '0' group by industry_involved
